Article: "Hours of Hope: A Charity Event for Children in Need"
backstory: After months of research and interviews, I uncovered a startling trend in the corporate world that had gone largely unseen for years. I set out to shed light on this troubling trend, researching document archives and speaking to industry insiders in order to piece together the story. Now, with a clearer understanding of how this trend affects individuals and organizations, I'm eager to share the results of my investigation.

Article: "Scientists unravel the genes responsible for long-distance migratory behavior in birds"
backstory: After a tip-off from a former employee, our journalist begins to uncover the unethical practices being employed by a large corporation. Through a series of interviews and investigations, it is revealed that these practices have been in effect for years and have resulted in millions of dollars in losses to the company and its shareholders. This story highlights the importance of ethical practices and the consequences that can occur when they are ignored.
